knowledge.question: The Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) is a network management protocol __________.
choices: used on networks whereby a server dynamically assigns an IP address to each device.
used to copy files from one host to another.
that defines a mechanism for communication between browser and the web server.
naming system for devices connected to the Internet and associates devices with domain names.
explanation: This is the definition for the FTP protocol
this is the definition for the HTTP protocol
this is the definition for DNS
